alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 2:37PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ashley County through 315 PM CST... At 237 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Crossett, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crossett around 240 PM CST. North Crossett around 245 PM CST. Berlin around 250 PM CST. Hamburg around 255 PM CST. Parkdale and Snyder around 305 PM CST. Portland and Montrose around 310 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
